name: Chase Champs
description:
Can you reach the podium? Tap to go left and release to go right. Outsmart and outspeed your opponents as you drift across the track. You can knock opponents off but don't fall off yourself!

Chase Champs Features:

• Simple and satisfying gameplay!
• Harder as you race against more players!
• No IAP – Chase Champs is a full game from the moment you download!

Crazy fun drift racing!
